resources.string: This app may fail to run in the background or with the screen off on some devices. Please visit https://dontkillmyapp.com/ to see solutions for your device.
Unfortunately, your phone lacks the necessary sensors for this app to function. Please try another phone, or consider building DIY Slime trackers.

string-array.name: sensor_type_dropdown
string-array.item: FSensor Complementary Gyroscope Sensor (TYPE_GYROSCOPE, TYPE_ACCELEROMETER, and TYPE_MAGNETIC_FIELD)
FSensor Kalman Gyroscope Sensor (TYPE_GYROSCOPE, TYPE_ACCELEROMETER, and TYPE_MAGNETIC_FIELD)
